markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Umbasi](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1501)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 41

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Umbasi](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1501)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 40</row>

**Perception** +21; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43), [Vudrani](/Languages.aspx?ID=45)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +23, [Bardic Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +23, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +26, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +25, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +4

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ (20 arrows), _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +27 

**Will** +23 

</row>

**HP** 190

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +23 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 2d8+11 piercing

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 34
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
- **1st**
[Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266), [Spirit Link](/Spells.aspx?ID=302), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Heroism](/Spells.aspx?ID=149), [Invisibility Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=165) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Blink](/Spells.aspx?ID=27), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=161), [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273), [Shadow Siphon](/Spells.aspx?ID=274) (3 slots)
- **6th**
[Collective Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=43), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344), [Zealous Conviction](/Spells.aspx?ID=378) (3 slots)
- **7th**
[Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=185), [True Target](/Spells.aspx?ID=346) (2 slots)

**Bard Composition Spells** DC 34, 3 Focus Points
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386), [Inspire Defense](/Spells.aspx?ID=387)
- **7th**
[Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381), [Inspire Heroics](/Spells.aspx?ID=388)

**Story of Valor** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101)) Umbasi expounds on the values of courage and respect. They remove the [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) condition from and reduce the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) value of each ally within 30 feet by 1. If this is the first time they've used this action in combat, Umbasi automatically rallies the crowd for their team (see the Crowd Appeal sidebar on page 45 of _Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!_).

</column>
name: Umbasi

text: Umbasi Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 41 Unspecific Lore : DC 39 Specific Lore : DC 36 Umbasi Source Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight! pg. 40 Perception +21; low-light vision Languages Common, Elven, Hallit, Mwangi, Tien, Vudrani Skills Arcana +23, Bardic Lore +23, Diplomacy +26, Occultism +25, Performance +28 Str +3 Dex +4 Con +1 Int +4 Wis +0 Cha +5 Items +1 striking composite longbow (20 arrows), +1 resilient explorer's clothing --- AC 33 Fort +20 Ref +27 Will +23 HP 190 --- Speed 25 feet Ranged Single Action fist +19 (Agile, Finesse, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 1d4+6 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action composite longbow +23 (deadly 1d10, Magical, Propulsive, range increment 100 feet, volley 30 feet), Damage 2d8+11 piercing Occult Spontaneous Spells DC 34 - Cantrips (7th) Daze, Detect Magic, Guidance, Light, Message - 1st Sanctuary, Spirit Link, True Strike (3 slots) - 2nd Dispel Magic, Silence, Sound Burst (3 slots) - 3rd Enthrall, Heroism, Invisibility Sphere (3 slots) - 4th Blink, Dimension Door, Fly (3 slots) - 5th Illusory Scene, Shadow Blast, Shadow Siphon (3 slots) - 6th Collective Transposition, True Seeing, Zealous Conviction (3 slots) - 7th Mask of Terror, True Target (2 slots) Bard Composition Spells DC 34, 3 Focus Points - Cantrips (7th) Inspire Courage, Inspire Defense - 7th Counter Performance, Inspire Heroics Story of Valor Single Action (Auditory, Linguistic) Umbasi expounds on the values of courage and respect. They remove the fleeing condition from and reduce the frightened value of each ally within 30 feet by 1. If this is the first time they've used this action in combat, Umbasi automatically rallies the crowd for their team (see the Crowd Appeal sidebar on page 45 of Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight! ).
